alert.note: Alert for Ballard (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 7:37PM EST until January 14 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Kentucky...Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam affecting Pulaski and Ballard Counties. Ohio River at Cairo affecting Mississippi, Ballard, Pulaski, Hickman, Alexander, Fulton and Carlisle Counties. .Heavy rain from last weekend has contributed to rises on the Ohio River drainage basin this week. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam, Cairo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY, JANUARY 14... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Thursday evening to Friday, January 14. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 32.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday evening to a crest of 39.5 feet Wednesday, January 12. It will then fall below flood stage Friday, January 14. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
